content: strands crochet hook 3 75 mm dimensions side approx 120 cm after blocking **sislove short** - yarn - liloppi swing melange - m013 50% merino/50% acrylic - 1400 m 4 strands crochet hook 3 75 mm dimensions side approx 110 cm after blocking **sis** - yarn - kokonki skeins ombre - classic a573 50% cotton/50% acrylic colours cream vanilla yellow turmeric mustard - 1000 m 4 strands crochet hook 3 5 mm dimensions side approx 90 cm after blocking you can find the full kokonki store offer here https //advertising cooperation sishomemade pl/kok 2 remember however that each person has a different way of crocheting - the dimensions and amount of yarn are approximate based on pattern tests if you have any questions or would like to see blankets made by others visit our fb group sishomemade pattern group the website contains affiliate links for using the offer sishomemade the website owner receives a commission from the company kokonki pl with which it cooperates you can follow us on ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/sishomemade instagram https //www instagram com/sishomemd pinterest https //pl pinterest com/sishandmd facebook https //www facebook com/sishomemd youtube youtube com/c/sishomemade 1 https //advertising cooperation sishomemade pl/kokonki 2 https //advertising cooperation sishomemade pl/kokonki
